\title{Vector Addition / Subtraction} \\
%text Adding / Subtracting two (or more) vectors expressed in component form. %

reason.tex: \begin{align} \ora{A}&=\vector{a_1}{a_2}{a_3} \\ \ora{B}&=\vector{b_1}{b_2}{b_3} \\ \ora{A}\pm\ora{B}&=\vector{(a_1\pm b_1)}{(a_2\pm b_2)}{(a_3\pm b_3)} \end{align} \\ %text Since the components along each unit vector are in the same direction, they can be added/subtracted as the case might be. %
